title: Refactor tick-activity-feed.ts to use comms store
description:
Update tick-activity-feed.ts to use comms store instead of api/ticks.ts:

1. Remove import: fetchActivity from api/ticks.ts
2. Add import: fetchActivity from stores/comms.ts

Keep type imports from api/ticks.ts if needed (Activity type).
acceptance_criteria: tick-activity-feed.ts has no function imports from api/ticks.ts, pnpm build succeeds
closed_reason: Refactored tick-activity-feed.ts to use fetchActivity from stores/comms.js, updated cloud mode check
